question: what do you guys think of my body?and what could do to get more defined? pics?
question_content:
http://www.flickr.com/photos/79075102@N04/8311824118/
http://www.flickr.com/photos/79075102@N04/8311825282/
Also i want a bigger frame and more defined abs. Can you guys give me exercises to do that makes me more defined and bigger all over.

answers.answer_content:
You can't make your frame bigger, your skeleton is a certain size.

You are very underweight! Gain 15 pounds and work on lunges, squats and free weights for arms. Then do your ab sets.
